description:
Streamline your systems management

Scan, collect, and organize your on-prem Windows machines so deployments go exactly where you need them to with PDQ Inventory.
Bug Fixes
- Fixed broken links at top of Help Manual
- Fixed readability issue on Tools/Scan Profiles screens in Free Mode
- Added missing Enterprise Only locks to already disabled views
- Fixed verbiage and broken link when in Free Mode for a New Package Scan Step
